techmeme.title: Sources: Klarna has halted its planned IPO in the wake of Trump's tariffs turmoil; StubHub has also delayed its IPO plans (Wall Street Journal)
Nintendo delays preorders for the Switch 2 from April 9, 2025 due to concerns about Trump's tariffs but the June 5 launch date remains unchanged (Emma Roth/The Verge)
Sam Altman says OpenAI plans to release o3 and o4-mini "after all" and GPT-5 "in a few months", citing challenges in "smoothly integrating everything" (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Vimeo launches Vimeo Streaming, letting creators launch subscription streaming services without any coding experience and offering features like AI translations (Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter)
China places export restrictions on key rare earth elements as part of its response to President Trump's tariffs and an extra 34% retaliatory tariff on US goods (Reuters)
